content.title: Isolated Iliac Artery Aneurysm
content.description: Aneurysm of the iliac arteries without associated AAA. Internal iliac aneurysms are most commonly isolated; common iliac more often associated with AAA.
content.epidemiology: 2-7% of aortoiliac aneurysms, mean age 70, male predominance, often bilateral

clinical_presentation.mass_effect: Ureteral obstruction, venous compression, neural compression

treatment.IIA_consideration: Unilateral sacrifice acceptable; bilateral may cause buttock claudication, erectile dysfunction
